Hello, i'm Max Lukin

I help business and companies to grow by consulting, developing and supporting using Software Engineering practices.

My area of interests includes large-scale web services, operational practices such as on-call and monitoring, effective developer tools and engineering leadership.

I enjoy working with open source (especially Ruby on Rails, and some JS / Golang), writing about technologies I work with.

Feel free to email me at lukin.maksim@gmail.com, check my linkedin profile or github
